name: Endless Grind Coffee
description: This family-owned coffee shop focuses on organic and fair-trade coffee from around the world and is the only micro-roastery in Aurora

name: Whittier Cafe
description: Denver's only African espresso bar, Whittier Cafe sources coffee from various African nations and offers a traditional East African coffee ceremony on Sundays. They also serve pastries and paninis

name: TeaLee's Tea Co.
description: This establishment is a tea house and bookstore offering a wide selection of teas, coffee, light bites, and a cultural space for community gatherings

name: Gypsy House Cafe
description: Gypsy House Cafe offers specialty teas, coffee, hot chocolates, sandwiches, falafel, hummus, and sweet treats in a space conducive to studying and socializing

name: Mojo Coffee
description: Mojo Coffee is an Ethiopian coffee shop with a variety of pastries, hot and iced drinks, and treats

name: Lucy Coffee House
description: This immigrant-owned Ethiopian coffee shop aims to be a place for newcomers to Colorado to find great coffee and have productive conversations, offering English and life skills coaching

name: Drip Queen Coffee
address: Chapel Hills Mall, Colorado Springs, CO
description: Drip Queen Coffee specializes in dessert-flavored cold brew coffee, CBD-infused coffee, and Tux Coffee, offering a unique coffee experience in Colorado Springs

name: Caffeinated Cow
address: Cheyenne Mountain Neighborhood, Colorado Springs, CO
description: This family- and veteran-owned coffee and ice cream shop also sells sandwiches and breakfast burritos

name: Migas Coffee
description: Migas Coffee is a Black and Latina-owned coffee shop serving coffee and fostering a sense of community

name: Arboretum Coffee
address: 221 W Prospect Road #100, Fort Collins, CO 80526
description: Arboretum Coffee is a non-profit craft coffee shop that offers a paid apprenticeship program for refugees and immigrants, providing job training and mentorship
